casebody.data:
Cincinnati Bar Association v. Altekruse.

[Cite as Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. Altekruse (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 266.]

(No. 93-2518 Submitted March 22, 1994 Decided May 11, 1994.) *267Taft, Stettinius & Hollister and Timothy E. Hoberg; and D. Michael Poast, for relator. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendation of the board. John L. Altekruse, Jr. is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents and would suspend respondent for one year.
